content: after designing the smooth sailing cowl mobius for the spin me a yarn annual cruise in 2024 i became obsessed with the joy of mobius knitting the pride in parallelograms cowl is my second design that was based on creating a cowl that would showcase the stunning ombre yarns of the blue brick yarns and how the colors expand out from the center to the cast off edge as well as a completely reversible fabric i hope that you enjoy knitting the pattern as much as i enjoyed designing this addictive knit
